summary: Successfully moved the 'Choose CSV File' button from the search screen to the spreadsheet screen toolbar. Implemented complete CSV upload functionality including file parsing, data loading into spreadsheet cells, error handling, and UI features like loading states and clear/change options. The button is now prominently placed as the first item in the spreadsheet toolbar.
current_status: CSV upload functionality fully integrated into the spreadsheet screen. Users can now upload CSV files directly in the spreadsheet interface, with automatic data population, error handling, and management options. The feature is ready for testing at localhost:3001 in the Spreadsheet section.
